main event: An observer reported seeing a small dark spot on the sun for approximately 5 minutes near Fairborn, Ohio on June 11, 1968.
interesting points: The observation was compared to the size of a D.B. ton wash tub,Dr. J. Allen Hynek concluded it was likely a sun spot,The observation occurred at 10:40 UTC,The observer had no prior experience with similar phenomena,The phenomenon disappeared when the sun became too bright to see.
sighted object: a small dark spot on the sun
witness description: The respondent reported the observation and filled out a questionnaire.
